attributes.action: the goverment must activate article 50 immediatley as per referendum result
attributes.additional_details: article 50 is the rule which starts the proceedure to leave the eu after which we have 2 years to negotiate terms so with mp`s delaying or even avoiding it this needs activating sooner, rather than later as mp wish us to beleive their are all ready 12 major nations wishing to trade with us freely including the german car manufacturers.the referendum was won by over 1,000,000 signatures please sign my petition to prove we do live in a democracy
attributes.background: mps are reneging on implementing article 50 theresa may says she will not implement it this year if at all other mps doing their best to stop it going through they have a mandate from the people as margaret thatcher once said  but are trying their upmost to stop it being implemented
